android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.description: Allows an application to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your data to other people.

android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.description: Allows an application to modify the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to erase or modify your contact data.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.USE_SIP.description: Allows an application to use the SIP service to make/receive Internet calls.

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.description: Allows application to modify global audio settings, such as volume and routing.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG.description: Allows an application to read the user's call log.

android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's call log data.

android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.description: Allows application to process outgoing calls and change the number to be dialled. Malicious applications may monitor, redirect or prevent outgoing calls.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description: Allows an application to configure the local Bluetooth phone and to discover and pair with remote devices.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_P.description: Marker permission for applications that wish to access notification policy.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

playstore_details.title: Free Call, Call Free Phone Calling App - CallGate
playstore_details.description:
Global Calls. Free Calling app - Free International calling and call recording with CallGate Voip app
Call Recorder International calls - Call Free anyone,any phone number and record the call worldwide even if he doesn't have CallGate installed.
Call free calling global wifi - free call via WiFi or cellular data, no cell minutes used.
Download this VOIP phone call app & enjoy cheap calls global to any mobile & landline!

Popular Destinations 
Free calls to India, Bangladesh, China, Kuwait, Nigeria, Canada, Dubai, Europe, Saudi Arabia, Mexico, Philippines, Pakistan,  UAE , United States, USA, Honduras, United Kingdom, UK, Canada, German, United Arab Emirates, SA

★ Features
- Global Calls high quality
- Free calling app unlimited with wifi 
- Free calling app with new number  
- Call recorder intcall 
- Free calling in 2019 by internet
- Free wifi calling and text
- Free calling recording 

★ Premium Call Quality 
- Free calling and text credit app 
- Free calling unlimited 
- Free Calls allows you to make a international calls to anyone across the globe for free, even if the recipient has no Internet connection. 
- Free international calling app 2019 
- Free calls recorder 

★  No Phone Bills 
Calling via Wifi or 3G/4G/LITE network, you don't get hit with expensive service charges. And best of all, you can pay as you go - there are no minimums, contracts or worries.

★ Unlimited FREE Call Credits
We have plenty of different offers on Free Call, just complete these simple offers and earn minutes to call non-Free Call users for FREE! You can receive free calling time easily by watching ads, playing game, completing tasks and inviting friends.

ALL CALLS ARE FREE
Free calls international calling app - 100% Free global phone call. No contract, no hidden fees.

WIFI Phone Call
No cell phone data plan? No problem. You can use WiFi to make free calls, free messages & international calling.

Global Coverage
Cheap or free international calls with Global coverage 
Supported Android devices include Huawei, Samsung, LG, Sony, Nexus and many more.

Free Calls - Enjoy cheap wifi phone calls with your international friends and family using CallGate
playstore_details.summary: Call Free - Free International Phone Calling App with Call Recorder. Free Call.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Call Free - Free International Phone Calling App with Call Recorder. Free Call.
